Technical key of a thoroughfare. As specified by BPDM, this can be a "STREET" or a different type.
Value of a thoroughfare, e.g. name of a street.
Number of a thoroughfare. As used differently in international context, this number can contain both numerical and alphanumerical values
Street or thorough road name
Technical key of a locality
Value of a locality, e.g. name of a city ("Mannheim").
Locality belonging to an address
Technical key of a premise
Value of a premise, e.g. name or designation of a particular site
Premise of an address, e.g. a specific "BUILDING" but can also be used for naming a particular site
Technical key of a postal delivery point
Value of a postal delivery point, e.g. designation of a gate
Delivery point, e.g. designation of a gate
Country of an address
The value of a post code
The technical key of a post code
An postal address
Legal entity which sells and invoices the battery
Maximum allowed battery power (W) of the battery is describing a business requirement.
Maximum allowed battery power (W) of the battery is describing a business requirement.
Power (capability) at 20% state of charge. Description from the regulation is describing a regulatory requirement.
Power (capability) at 80% state of charge. Description from the regulation is describing a regulatory requirement.
Performance ability of the high voltage battery i.e. the amount of energy that a battery is capable to provide over a given period of time is describing a regulatory requirement.
Performance ability of the high voltage battery according to limits i.e. how much power it can provide within given limits is describing a regulatory requirement.
Characteristic to describe the power (W) properties of the battery.
Value of the minimal voltage the battery is rated for is describing a regulatory requirement.
Value of the nominal voltage the battery is rated for is describing a regulatory requirement.
Value of the maximum voltage the battery is rated for is describing a regulatory requirement.
Voltage (V) of the battery.
The total number of ampere-hours (Ah) that can be withdrawn from a fully charged battery under specific conditions is describing a regulatory requirement.

The decrease over time and upon usage in the amount of charge that a battery can deliver at the rated voltage, with respect to the original rated capacity declared by the manufacturer is describing a regulatory requirement.
The resistance offered by the cell in the flow of the current
Total internal resistance in a battery pack is describing a regulatory requirement.
Increase in internal resistance of a battery pack over a period of time is describing a regulatory requirement.
Internal resistance in a battery cell or pack is describing a regulatory requirement.
Capacity threshold for exhaustion as percentage value is describing a regulatory requirement.
Maximum allowed battery energy (Wh) of the battery is describing a regulatory requirement.
Round-trip efficiency is the percentage of electricity put into storage is describing a regulatory requirement.
Round-trip efficiency is the percentage of electricity put into storage is describing a regulatory requirement.
Characteristic to describe the energy (kWh) properties of the battery.

Width of the item is describing a business requirement.
Height of the item is describing a business requirement.
Diameter of the item.
Weight of the item is describing a regulatory requirement.
Geometrical properties of the battery
Evidence/Certificate of the health evaluation of a battery for its use following repurposing or remanufacturing operations is describing a business requirement.
The value of the state of charge of the battery at the end of life i.e. when entering recycling scheme is describing a business requirement.
Status of the battery is describing a regulatory requirement. Value list provided by the regulators.
The condition of the battery at the end of life i.e. when entering recycling scheme
Battery type as described by the contents of the battery e.g. cell chemistry is describing a regulatory requirement.
Battery type as described by the contents of the battery e.g. cell chemistry is describing a regulatory requirement.
Digital Matrix Code (DMC) of the battery i.e. serial number allowing for unequivocal identification of a battery is describing a regulatory requirement.
Information to identify a specific battery.
Manufacturing date of the battery is describing a regulatory requirement.
